sqlMap.select:
select c.case_name as testPlanName , a.case_number,b.passCaseNumber, count(a.case_number) as totalCaseNumber, (b.passCaseNumber/count(a.case_number))*100 as passRate, max(case_end_time) as endDate, min(case_start_time) as startDate from caseresult as a left join (select sum(case_excute_state)/2 as passCaseNumber,case_number as ca from caseresult where case_excute_state =2 group by case_number) as b on a.case_number=b.ca left join caselisttable as c on a.case_number=c.case_number where a.batch_number=#testSuiteNO# group by a.case_number
$sortField$ $sortOrder$
limit #pageIndex#,#pageSize#
select count(distinct case_number) from caseresult where batch_number=#testSuiteNO#
select count(*) from caseresult where batch_number=#testSuiteNO# and case_number=#testPlanName#

select id as caseNO, device_name as serviceName, case_result_path as passValidation, (case case_excute_state when 1 then 'Processing' when 2 then 'Passed' when 3 then 'Failed' ELSE '其他' END)as rCode , (case_end_time-case_start_time) as processTime from caseresult where batch_number=#testSuiteNO# and case_number=#case_number#
$sortField$ $sortOrder$
limit #pageIndex#,#pageSize#
select count(*) from test_assertion where test_id=#testId#

select id as id,assert_no as assertNo,assert_path as assertPath,isPass as isPass,message as message from test_assertion where test_id=#testId#
$sortField$ $sortOrder$
limit #pageIndex#,#pageSize#
select id as id,request as request,response as response from test_detail where id=#testId#

select count(distinct a.batch_number)as des,a.batch_number as testSuiteNo,a.case_start_time as testDate,b.batch_owner as user from caseresult as a left join batchtable as b on a.batch_number=b.batch_number
$sortField$ $sortOrder$
limit #pageIndex#,#pageSize#
select count(distinct batch_number) from caseresult where batch_number is not null
